page.title: 06CUMBERNAULD-A SAFE TOWN
page.content: Because Cumbernauld is a new town and also very modern,roads and pathways are very well planned.To make the town as safe as possible the{pathways and {roads are separated}except in the older areas.Where I live in Westfield there are no paths alongside roads but sometimes we do have to cross the smaller roads.This means that where I live{is very safe for pedestrians}and accidents hardly ever happen.Close by in Condorrat village there are paths alongside the road and we have to be careful when walking there.The shortest routes around Cumbernauld are by road but the safe path takes much longer.Sometimes people say Cumbernauld was{designed for cars not {people.}
